about_the_game:
EARLY ACCESS DISCLAIMER: Strayed is currently in active development and is being offered as an early access title. It may contain bugs, incomplete features, and content that is subject to change. We are continuously working hard to improve the game with updates every two weeks. Your feedback is greatly appreciated as we progress toward the final product.

Welcome to Strayed - an open-world multiplayer VR survival game focused on player vs. player interaction. Spawn empty-handed on procedurally generated islands; explore the wilderness and deserted structures; gather resources and build your shelter. Be warned - others are just as motivated as you are.

Dropped on procedurally generated islands with only a rock and a torch, you start as a “Naked” - literally and figuratively - eager to make it until dawn or dusk.

If you’re skilled enough to fight your way off the beach, you may find yourself either in an abandoned structure - or more of the wilderness. Explore the unknown in immersive VR while you instinctively choose your next move for survival’s sake.

Use anything at your disposal. Smash, gather, loot, hunt, craft, and build - all in the name of living.

Whether you like it or not - you’re never alone. Meet other players on the islands as you go through your survival journey. Some will be willing to make friends; some won’t be. Keep in mind - you're not the only one trying to survive.

content_descriptors.notes: Players have the option to hurt and/or kill other players and animals with firearms, blades, blunt objects, or explosives.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700 8 Core 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 6GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenVR on SteamVR with Index and Meta Quest headsets/controllers only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel Core i5 6 Core 3.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 6GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenVR on SteamVR with Index and Meta Quest headsets/controllers only

Be warned - others are just as motivated as you are.
